about_the_game:
League of Masters is the next generation of PvP! We've combined elements of Auto Chess and RPG to create a strategic game with a deep progression system. Every player has a chance to win, but the higher your tactical preparation, the greater your chances of success! Showcase your intellect and claim victory!
Unlike traditional Auto Chess games, success also depends on the power of your commanders, but they won't succeed without your smart and tactical approach. Join the League of Masters community now and help your commanders secure victory!

Prove your worth in PVP battles



In PvP battles, you'll fight against players from around the world. Everything will come into play: cunning, tactics, strategic maneuvers, and even psychological attacks. And most importantly, you can conduct a battle and defeat the enemy in just 15 minutes. Specially designed graphics for the genre will finally help distinguish units from each other. We've put in the effort!

Level up your commanders and dominate


In League of Masters, there are a whopping 12 unique commanders! Each has its own abilities that increase damage and enhance tactics. Even if your opponents lack experience and skills, their commanders can be much stronger than yours, so you always need to be on guard and adjust your strategy as the battle unfolds.

Choose fighters wisely


Demon or genie? Mage or archer? The game features over 50 units of different classes and synergies for both PvP and PvE battles. Just look at how powerful they are! Assemble an unbeatable team and test different strategies to find the perfect one.

Crafted by strategists for strategists


Our team consists almost entirely of players with 20 years of experience, who prioritize skill and knowledge over grind and unfair play. League of Masters is pure strategy, endless possibilities, and fair competition.

content_descriptors.notes: Adult content refers to the ability to defeat an enemy, essentially eliminating them. In the game, this action is not accompanied by any additional effects. There are no scenes of violence in the game.

name: League of Masters: Auto Chess

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8,10
  • Processor: Intel - Core i3-530, AMD - A6-3650
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9600GT, HD 6570, Intel HD 4000
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

short_description: League of Masters is a new take on the Auto Chess genre. Our game is a dynamic PvP experience with a deep progression system. Challenge friends and foes in an epic battle of wits that will determine who the true strategist is.
